title: Customer Churn Analysis
prompt:
Analyze this customer data to identify churn patterns:

| Customer_ID | Tenure_Months | Monthly_Charges | Total_Charges | Churn |
|-------------|---------------|-----------------|---------------|-------|
| 001 | 12 | $85.50 | $1,026.00 | Yes |
| 002 | 24 | $65.20 | $1,564.80 | No |
| 003 | 6 | $95.00 | $570.00 | Yes |

Identify key factors contributing to churn and recommend retention strategies.

evaluation_criteria.visualization: Clear charts or tables when appropriate
